sql_mapping.insert: insert into mz_state (country_id, name, created_date, modified_date) values (#country_id#, '#name#', '#created_date#', '#modified_date#')
insert into mz_state (state_id, country_id, name, created_date, modified_date) values (#state_id#, #country_id#, '#name#', '#created_date#', '#modified_date#')
